title: Debunking the '7-Year Rule': The Real Science of Dog Age
excerpt: Discover why the traditional '1 dog year = 7 human years' rule is scientifically inaccurate and learn the modern approach to calculating your dog's real age.
author: Dr. Emily Rodriguez, DVM

title: Is My Dog Overweight? Signs Every Owner Should Know
excerpt: Learn to recognize the early signs of canine obesity and understand how to properly assess your dog's body condition score at home.
author: Sarah Johnson, Canine Nutritionist

title: Why Small Dogs Live Longer: The Size-Lifespan Connection
excerpt: Explore the fascinating relationship between dog size and lifespan, and discover what science tells us about why Chihuahuas outlive Great Danes.
author: Dr. Michael Chen, Animal Geneticist

title: Senior Dog Care: Adjusting to Your Aging Pet's Needs
excerpt: Comprehensive guide to caring for senior dogs, including dietary changes, exercise modifications, and health monitoring strategies.
author: Dr. Lisa Wang, Geriatric Veterinarian

title: Puppy Development Timeline: What to Expect Each Month
excerpt: Month-by-month guide to puppy development, including physical growth, behavioral changes, and important milestones to watch for.
author: Amanda Foster, Puppy Trainer

title: The Hidden Dangers of Canine Obesity
excerpt: Understand the serious health risks associated with dog obesity and learn preventive measures to keep your pet at a healthy weight.
author: Dr. Robert Kim, Veterinary Internist

title: Breed-Specific Health Concerns: What Every Owner Should Know
excerpt: Comprehensive overview of common health issues in popular dog breeds and how to provide proactive care for breed-specific conditions.
author: Dr. Jennifer Adams, Breed Specialist

title: Understanding Your Dog's Body Language Through Life Stages
excerpt: Learn how your dog's communication changes as they age and how to interpret their body language at different life stages.
author: Dr. Tom Wilson, Animal Behaviorist
